channel.title: Website on MIEZEPY
channel.description: Recent content in Website on MIEZEPY

item.title: Added installation instructions for windows
item.description: Installation instructions for Windows The installation instructions for windows were completed and should allow windows users to install MIEZEPY onto their platform.

item.title: Website live
item.description: The MIEZEPY website is live The website has been designed using the already present scmlz hugo theme. This allowed a fast implementation. The website aims at providing important news as well as installation instructions. A few how-to’s and tutorials will also be proposed in the long term.

item.title: Added installation instructions
item.description: Installation instructions for Linux and MacOs The installation instruction for Linux and MacOs are now present on the website and can be found in the documentation section. Be aware that the instructions for linux might slightly differ depending on the distribution you are using. We hope it eases the installation process.
